results.title: Metformin inhibits pulmonary artery smooth muscle cell proliferation by upregulating p21 via NONRATT015587.2
results.text_hl: In the current study, a @CHEMICAL_Monocrotaline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016686 @@@monocrotaline@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Monocrotaline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016686 @@@MCT@@@)-induced @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@PAH@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model and cultured pulmonary artery smooth muscle cells (PASMCs) were used in vitro to elucidate the exact mechanism of NONRATT015587.2 in @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066253 @@@pulmonary vascular remodeling@@@, alongside the effect following @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@GENE_SLTM @GENE_79811 @@@MET@@@) treatment on @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066253 @@@vascular remodeling@@@ and smooth muscle cell proliferation.

citations.NLM: Sun Z, Liu Y, Hu R, Wang T, Li Y, Liu N. Metformin inhibits pulmonary artery smooth muscle cell proliferation by upregulating p21 via NONRATT015587.2 Int J Mol Med. 2022 Apr;49(4):. PMID: 35147202

results.title: AMPK activation by metformin protects against pulmonary hypertension in rats and relaxes isolated human pulmonary artery.
results.text_hl: Our results showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ protected against @DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@PH@@@ progression in @CHEMICAL_Monocrotaline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016686 @@@MCT@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ where it reduced the mean pulmonary artery pressure, @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066253 @@@pulmonary vascular remodeling@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Right_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017380 @@@right ventricular hypertrophy@@@ and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ compared to vehicle-treated @CHEMICAL_Monocrotaline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016686 @@@MCT@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Cardiac fibrosis and vascular remodeling are attenuated by metformin in obese rats.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@Cardiac fibrosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066253 @@@vascular remodeling@@@ are attenuated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Vascular protection in diabetic stroke: role of matrix metalloprotease-dependent vascular remodeling.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@Infarct@@@ size was smaller in @CHEMICAL_Minocycline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008911 @@@minocycline@@@-treated animals. Both @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Minocycline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008911 @@@minocycline@@@ reduced @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066253 @@@vascular remodeling@@@ and severity of @DISEASE_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@HT@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

results.title: Metformin Prevents Progression of Experimental Pulmonary Hypertension via Inhibition of Autophagy and Activation of Adenosine Monophosphate-Activated Protein Kinase.
results.text_hl: However, the mechanism of how @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ inhibits autophagy and reverses @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066253 @@@pulmonary vascular remodeling@@@ is still unclear.

results.title: Metformin Reverses Development of Pulmonary Hypertension via Aromatase Inhibition.
results.text_hl: We also investigated its influence on proliferation in @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ pulmonary arterial smooth muscle cells. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ reversed right ventricular systolic pressure, @DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Right_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017380 @@@right ventricular hypertrophy@@@, and decreased @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066253 @@@pulmonary vascular remodeling@@@ in the @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@.

results.title: Protective role of the antidiabetic drug metformin against chronic experimental pulmonary hypertension.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066253 @@@Pulmonary arterial remodelling@@@ occurring in both experimental models of @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@PAH@@@ was also inhibited by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment.

results.title: Metabolic Syndrome Exacerbates Pulmonary Hypertension due to Left Heart Disease.
results.text_hl: In vivo, in the supracoronary aortic banding+@DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@MetS@@@ animals, reducing @GENE_IL6 @GENE_24498 @@@IL-6@@@, either by anti-@GENE_IL6 @GENE_3569 @@@IL-6@@@ antibody or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment, reversed @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066253 @@@pulmonary vascular remodeling@@@ and improve @DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@PH@@@ due to @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@LHD@@@.

results.title: Linagliptin attenuates diabetes-induced cerebral pathological neovascularization in a blood glucose-independent manner: Potential role of ET-1.
results.text_hl: AIMS: We have shown that glycemic control with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ or @GENE_EDN1 @GENE_24323 @@@endothelin-1@@@ (@GENE_EDN1 @GENE_24323 @@@ET-1@@@) inhibition with @CHEMICAL_Bosentan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077300 @@@bosentan@@@ prevents and restores @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@-mediated @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066253 @@@cerebral pathological remodeling@@@ and neovascularization.
